title: I Want to Make it for Them!
detail_text: <:th_ch0003/>This is so delicious......!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Right~? ğ… <:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>I was shocked when I heard about miso pound cake, but itâ€™s so delicious~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Hehehe~ Haruka-chan praised this recipe, so Iâ€™m very proud of it~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Iâ€™d love to make this for Honoka and the others. May I have the recipe?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Of course, of course~! How about we make it together right now?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Really!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Definitely~! But Iâ€™d also like to learn one of your signature recipes, Kotori-chan~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>One of my signature recipes...... Okay, leave it to me!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Yay~! This is a win-win~ ğ… <:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
